__e: We wanted to inform you we are orbiting Risa and are ready to beam you aboard.
Get us back into orbit and I want a full damage...
Contact Harry. Let him know we'll be leaving orbit.
Good, I think you'll find that the orbit lock is broken as well.
But he'll be as right as rain as soon as we leave orbit.
Today, three years, two months, and three days afterwards... we're ready, after 10 scheduled attempts... Attagirl.
If you really do have Harry Kim's memories, you know that I'm going to do whatever it takes to get this ship back in orbit.
But did you learn anything that might help us break orbit?
We remain in orbit, investigating the accident.
We can hide for a while, but may have to go out of orbit to keep it up for long.
Earth was in a different orbit around the sun 5,000 years ago.
